games.title: TRAFFIC JAM ESCAPE 3D
games.description:
Clear the roads in Traffic Jam Escape 3D! Solve challenging traffic puzzles, free cars from gridlock, and master the art of strategic driving.

Get ready to play Traffic Jam Escape 3D, the addictive mobile traffic puzzle game where you control chaotic city streets and free cars from gridlock! Every second counts - one smart move can clear the road, one mistake can block it forever. Are you skilled enough to guide every car out of the jam?

In Traffic Jam Escape 3D, your goal is simple but challenging: tap cars, follow the arrows, and plan their path to freedom. Avoid collisions, dodge obstacles, and keep traffic moving smoothly. With each level, timing and strategy become even more important - one wrong move could create a crash and block the way.

Every stage offers a brand-new challenge. You‚Äôll need to think ahead, plan the order of moves, and figure out the best escape route for each vehicle. From narrow alleys to busy intersections, the puzzles get tougher and more exciting as you progress.

Featuring a wide variety of vehicles - from tiny cars to large trucks - you‚Äôll need to adapt your strategy to guide each one safely out of the mess. The more you play, the sharper your skills become as you conquer increasingly complex traffic jams.

Key Features of Traffic Jam Escape 3D:
Challenging traffic jam escape puzzles at every level
Intuitive tap-and-guide controls for all ages
Dynamic gameplay with busy intersections, narrow roads, and tricky obstacles
Dozens of levels with increasing difficulty to keep you hooked
Vibrant graphics and realistic sound effects for an immersive experience
Traffic Jam Escape isn‚Äôt just about clearing the streets‚Äîit‚Äôs about mastering the art of smart maneuvering. Dodge oncoming traffic, weave through tight spaces, and avoid obstacles at every turn. With dozens of levels to conquer, the game offers a constant challenge and endless fun.

Whether you‚Äôre solving quick car escape puzzles on the go or tackling more complex jam-packed streets at home, Traffic Jam Escape 3D delivers nonstop excitement and tests your problem-solving skills.

games.title: English Checkers Online Multiplayer
games.howToPlayText:
**How to Play English Checkers**

English Checkers is a strategic board game where players aim to capture their opponent‚Äôs checkers or block them completely. Here‚Äôs how to get started and understand the basic rules:

**Game Objective**
The goal is to either capture all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers or completely block them so they can‚Äôt make any legal moves.

**Types of Checkers**
- **Simple checker:** moves diagonally forward one square and can only capture forward.
- **King:** can move diagonally both forward and backward on any free square and can capture in both directions. When a simple checker reaches the last row, it becomes a king and gains these additional abilities.

**Basic Movement and Capture Rules**
1. **Movement:**
- simple checkers move diagonally forward one square at a time;
- kings can move diagonally in any direction on any free square.

2. **Capture:**
- if your checker is next to your opponent‚Äôs checker and there‚Äôs an empty square behind it, you must jump over the opponent‚Äôs checker and land in the empty square, capturing the opponent‚Äôs piece;
- captures are mandatory ‚Äî if you have the option to capture, you must do so;
- if a capture leads to another possible capture, you must continue capturing as part of the same turn until no more captures are possible;
- when a simple checker reaches the last row during a capture, it becomes a king but cannot make further moves in the same turn.

3. **Choosing Capture Options:**
- if there are multiple capture options available, you can choose which one to make;
- the ¬´Turkish strike¬ª rule means that a checker that has been beaten but not yet removed from the board can block the path of a king or another checker.

**Winning the Game**
You win the game by:
- capturing all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers;
- blocking your opponent so that they have no legal moves left.

**Getting Started in English Checkers Online Multiplayer**
1. **Choose your game mode:** play against the computer, compete online with real players, or play with a friend on the same screen.
2. **Select your difficulty level or opponent:** if playing against the computer, choose from 10 difficulty levels; if playing online, find a real opponent.
3. **Choose your side:** select whether you want to play as black or white.
4. **Start playing:** follow the rules of movement and capture to outmanoeuvre your opponent and achieve victory.

Enjoy the game and sharpen your strategic skills with English Checkers Online Multiplayer!

There are no diagonal movements, which poses a tricky challenge when several balls are on the table. 
The key to winning the level is to think about the order of each move to ensure you can line up all the shots successfully.

games.title: Go Up
games.description:
Welcome to Go Up, the exciting free mobile game that challenges you to protect the balloon as it rises higher and higher into the sky. Get ready to put your skills to the ultimate test with this amazing balloon game that'll keep you on your toes and your eyes glued to the screen.

Picture this. You have a tiny balloon you need to protect. You need to push away all the pointy and heavy things that get in the way of your balloon going up. But it's not that easy. The sky is full of all kinds of strange things like blocks, beams, and triangles. If your balloon even touches one of these, it's all over. Exciting, right?

But it gets even better! The higher your balloon goes, the harder the game gets. The obstacles become trickier and more difficult to avoid. You can push everything out of the way, but watch out! If you send blocks flying everywhere, you will find it difficult to protect the balloon.
games.howToPlayText:
You have a ‚Äúshield‚Äù or barrier (often a circular protective plane) that you can move around the balloon to push objects aside.
You swipe or drag on the screen to reposition your shield around the balloon. (While the store page doesn‚Äôt explicitly describe the swipe controls, that‚Äôs the common mechanic for this kind of game.)
You must time your moves carefully pushing obstacles too late or too aggressively can send them flying in directions that block the balloon again.
The higher you get (the further in the level), the more frequent and more complex obstacles appear.

games.title: Sorting Ball Puzzle
games.description:
As the most relaxing and addictive color sorting game, this ball puzzle is designed to entertain and sharpen your mind at the same time. While sorting the colored balls to fill each bottle with the same color, the relaxation it brings will relieve stress and distract you from your daily worries.

This classic color sorting game is pretty simple to play, but hard to master. Just tap to take a colored ball from one bottle and stack it into another bottle, until all balls of the same color are in the same bottle. However, there are thousands of puzzles of varying difficulty. The more challenging the puzzles you play, the more careful you need to be with each move. Each move cannot be taken lightly, or you may get stuck! This Ball Sort game is definitely the best puzzle game for you to exercise your brain and train your logical thinking.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap any bottle to pick up the top ball, then tap another bottle to move the ball into it.
You can only stack the ball into a bottle with the same color ball on top and enough space.
When balls of the same color are sorted into a single bottle, you win!
Each bottle can only be placed with 4 balls.
Use "Undo" to go back to previous steps.
Add an extra bottle if you get stuck.
You can restart the current level at any time.

games.title: Maths Puzzle
games.description: Maths Puzzle is a fun and engaging logic-based game that challenges your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. With a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, this game is perfect for anyone looking to improve their mental agility and enjoy a fun, educational experience. Your task is to solve mathematical equations by figuring out the missing numbers, symbols, or operations in order to make both sides of the equation equal. The puzzles come with increasing complexity, so you‚Äôll need both strategy and quick thinking to succeed.
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Your goal is to solve the math puzzle by filling in the missing numbers or operations to make the equation correct.

Start the Game: Click on the puzzle to begin. You‚Äôll be presented with an equation that is missing some parts (numbers or operators).

Solve the Puzzle: Use your knowledge of basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division) to complete the puzzle. You may need to fill in missing numbers or choose the correct mathematical operators to balance both sides of the equation.

Hints: If you're stuck, some versions of the game offer hints that help guide you towards the solution. Use them wisely to avoid wasting moves.

Levels: As you progress, the difficulty will increase. New challenges such as more complex equations or multiple missing elements will keep you on your toes.

Time and Scoring: Depending on the version of the game, you may be timed, so solving the puzzles quickly could earn you more points or rewards.

Winning the Game: Successfully solve a series of puzzles to move to the next level. Keep going to challenge your brain and improve your math skills.

games.title: Stack Master
games.description:
Stack master is a minimalistic, endless stacking game where your goal is to build the tower as high as possible by perfectly aligning moving blocks.
The graphics are simple and clean, focusing on smooth gameplay without distractions.
You compete globally for the highest score (tower height) on leaderboards.
games.howToPlayText:
When you start, a block (or ‚Äúslice‚Äù) begins sliding horizontally across the screen at some height.
You tap the screen (or tap a control) to drop the moving block onto the block beneath it.
The better the alignment with the block below, the more of the block remains. If part of the block overhangs, the overhanging part is cut off.
If you drop with a slight misalignment, the excess portion is cut away and removed, making your next block smaller.
If your misalignment is very poor (i.e. almost no overlap), you might lose the block entirely, ending the game.
Each successful drop continues the tower upward. The goal is to stack as many as possible, reaching the highest possible height (score).
As the tower gets higher, it becomes more challenging. The blocks may move faster or require more precision. (This is common in stacking games of this type.)

games.howToPlayText:
Moves are only allowed on dark squares, so pieces always move diagonally. Single pieces are always restricted to moving forward (towards the opponent).
Capture pieces by jumping.
A piece that makes a capture (jump) jumps over one of the opponent's pieces and lands in a straight diagonal line on the other side. Only one piece can be captured in one jump; however, multiple jumps are allowed in one move.
Jumps (or captures) are mandatory.
If a player can make a capture, the jump must be made.

When a piece reaches the furthest row from the player who controls it, it becomes a king and can move either forward or backward.

games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is simple: Jump high, grab coins, and soar to new stages. Miss a grab, and it's Game Over‚Äîstay sharp and quickly make your next move. Keep aiming for the highest score. Use the arrow keys to move left or right to jump on the platforms.

Gold Coins: Snag 100 for a boost.
x2 & x5 Coins: Blue and red-centered coins are worth double and quintuple‚Äîcha-ching.
Trickster Coins: Watch out; these sneaky coins run away when you get close.

Boost Stars
Shiny stars launch you higher. Yellow, green, blue, and red‚Äîeach more potent than the last. Collect as many as possible to gain massive boosts and fly to new heights.

Save Stars

Power-ups to the Rescue
Umbrella: Float down gently and magnetize coins.
Jump Boots: Bigger, faster, higher jumps.
Magnet: Pull in coins like a boss.
Lucky Blast: Transform everything into coins and stars.

Avoid These Dangers
Anvil: Stops you cold. Dodge it.
Ball & Chain: Slows you down‚Äîugh.
Shrinkify Potion: Tiny and tricky.

Bounce on blocks, outsmart enemies, and blast past obstacles. Ready to jump into the fun? Let's go.

games.title: Drone Dash - Time Challenges!
games.description:
**How to Play**

Welcome to **Drone Dash - Time Challenges** ‚Äì a fast-paced arcade puzzler where quick thinking and precision bouncing are the keys to victory! You‚Äôll control a zippy little drone that *dashes* between walls and platforms like a high-tech pinball. But this isn‚Äôt your typical platformer ‚Äì no jumping, no gravity drops. Your drone glides and ricochets from surface to surface, smoothly darting through tight spaces full of traps and twists.

Your mission? **Collect as many bullets as you can before time runs out!** The more you grab, the more stars you‚Äôll earn (up to 3 per level). Once you collect the minimum required, a glowing crystal spawns back at your starting point ‚Äì reach it to complete the level. But watch out! Hit a trap or run out of time, and it's back to the start.

Levels are short, intense, and packed with surprises. New traps and tricky tiles will keep you on your toes as you dash your way to perfection. Fast reflexes and smart movement make all the difference!

**Controls:**
üñ±Ô∏è On PC: Just click to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!
üì± On Mobile: Just tap to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!

Ready to test your reflexes and grab those stars? Dive into the dash and beat the clock!

Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

–ö–∞–∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å
Control on the PC: by arrow buttons, on the smartphone - by swipes and taps on the screen.

Swipe: left/right arrow, tap on the screen to the left/right of the player.
Combo: repeatedly pressing the button in the direction where you want to apply a combo / multiple tap to the left or right of the player.
Sit down: down arrow / swipe down.
Jump: arrow up / swipe up.
Double jump (if available for a specific skin): double arrow up / two swipe up

Uppercut - squat and jump, arrow down and up / swipe down and up;
Attack from above - press the down arrow / swipe down while jumping.

The enemies drop weapons and lives. You can pick them up by tapping/tapping in their direction.

The enemy on the ball and comet can be shot down. The rat in the window can be turned off briefly by throwing a weapon at it.
Levels in the Survival game mode are unlocked as you progress through the main Campaign.

games.title: Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure
games.description: Dudes, this is a very short strategic card battle game that blends tactical gameplay with quirky humor and vibrant creativity. Build powerful armies, summon creatures, cast spells, and construct buildings across unique terrains in epic turn-based battles. What sets this game apart is its dynamic terrain system‚Äîeach battlefield zone corresponds to specific card types, favoring attackers, healers, defenders, or versatile "special units" that can be placed anywhere! With customizable decks and deep strategic options, players must outwit their opponents to claim victory. Unlock new cards, upgrade your favorites heroes, and dominate the battlefield in this thrilling clash of wits and strategy. Let's go. In and out. After all, this is Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢ Deck Building: Before starting a match, create your deck using cards you‚Äôve collected. Customize your deck based on strategy‚Äîfocus on attack-heavy units, healing abilities, or powerful spells. 
‚Ä¢ Terrain Zones: At the start of the game, choose which terrains to place on your side of the board. Each terrain type allows only certain creatures to be summoned there, except Rainbow Creatures, which are flexible. Terrain types:
- Cornfields: Strong attackers.
- Sandlands: Defensive powerhouses.
- Blue Plains: Balanced but unpredictable.
- Candy Kingdom: Weak but great at healing allies.
- Useless Swamp: Special ability users or direct-damage dealers.
‚Ä¢ Turn-Based Mechanics: On your turn, draw cards, spend resources (Magic Points), and deploy creatures, buildings, or spells onto the field. Attack enemy creatures or target their towers directly when possible. 
‚Ä¢ Winning Conditions: Outlast your opponent by maintaining stronger forces, controlling key areas, and dealing consistent damage.

games.howToPlayText:

games.description: Cosmic Dash is an endless space runner where you pilot your way across the solar system, dodging space junk, collecting tokens, and smashing asteroids. Move ‚Äì Use LEFT / RIGHT arrows to change position

Boost ‚Äì Press SPACE to speed up and smash through asteroids

Controls (Touch / Mobile):

Jump ‚Äì Swipe UP

Shrink ‚Äì Swipe DOWN

Move ‚Äì Swipe LEFT / RIGHT

Boost ‚Äì Tap the screen


ü™ê Tips & Mechanics:

Collect small tokens to increase your score.

Grab BIG TOKENS to automatically pull in smaller ones.

Use SHRINK to slip past dangerous space junk.

Use BOOST to destroy glowing asteroids and clear the way.

The further you travel, the more challenging and rewarding the journey becomes.

games.title: Mini Golf Battle
games.description:
Mini Golf Battle is a fun and casual mini golf challenge where your goal is simple: hit the ball into the hole with as few shots as possible. The game combines easy controls with tricky levels full of slopes, angles, and obstacles that test your timing and precision.
Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you‚Äôll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It‚Äôs a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It‚Äôs useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don‚Äôt want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can‚Äôt reach.

A simple but addictive one-line puzzle game that‚Äôs completely free to play.

Your brain becomes more active the more you play.
During your commute, before you sleep‚Ä¶ enjoy downtime with brain training.

The rules are extremely simple.

games.howToPlayText:

games.title: Animal Merge
games.description:
Objective: Merge animal bubbles to create upgraded animals and ultimately achieve the final objective by collecting fully developed animals.
Gameplay Instructions:
Launching the Animal Bubbles:
Tap on an animal bubble to select it.
Drag the bubble backward to aim.
Release to launch the bubble in the opposite direction.
Merging Animal Bubbles:
When two identical animal bubbles collide, they merge to create an upgraded version.
Continue merging bubbles of the same type to progress.
Achieving the Objective:
Merge two basic-level animal bubbles to form an intermediate-level animal.
Merge intermediate-level animal bubbles to create the final full-fledged animal.
Once the final animal is created, it is automatically collected as part of the level objective.
Winning the Level:
The level is completed when you have successfully created and collected the required number of final animals.

Control the game using joystick or accelerometer to guide the paddle with precision, keeping the ball in play and scoring points. Enjoy dynamic music, unlock various paddles. Tilt & Tumble delivers an exhilarating gaming experience that keeps you coming back for more.
games.howToPlayText:
Use the tilt controls to guide the ball. Tilt your device left or right to make the ball roll in the desired direction.
As you roll, you'll encounter obstacles like walls, spikes, and other traps. Be careful and try to avoid them to keep your ball intact.
Along the way, you‚Äôll find collectibles such as coins or gems. Make sure to grab them to increase your score.
Your objective is to reach the finish line as quickly as possible. Each level has a time limit, so you need to be fast and strategic to win.

Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!

[A] / [D] ‚Üí Move:
Use [A] and [D] to move left or right. Dodge obstacles, take advantage of openings, and be prepared for any challenge that comes your way. Your agility is key!

[Space] ‚Üí Jump / Float:
Hold down the [Space] key to jump or float. Jump over obstacles or float in the air to avoid dangers that cross your path. Air control can be the difference between success and failure!

[Ctrl] ‚Üí Slide:
Use [Ctrl] to slide under obstacles and save yourself from critical situations. Slide quickly to pass under low obstacles and keep advancing without missing a beat.

games.title: Cup Quest

Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey: A Feline Hero‚Äôs Adventure Begins!

Join a brave cat on an epic quest in Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey, a fresh twist on the classic balls-and-cups game. This isn't just about tossing balls into cups‚Äîit's a full-blown adventure packed with clever puzzles, physics-based challenges, and one courageous kitty determined to save the day.

Your Cat, the Hero
Meet your furry champion‚Äîa quick-thinking, nimble cat with a heart of gold. As danger looms and traps lie in wait, it‚Äôs up to this whiskered warrior to take on wild levels filled with spinning platforms, explosives, and tricky obstacles.

Precision Meets Puzzle
Each level is a test of aim and timing. Launch the ball just right, bounce it off the environment, and land it perfectly in the cup. It‚Äôs not just about power‚Äîsuccess requires strategy, finesse, and a little creative thinking.
 What Awaits You
- Over 200 unique levels, ranging from simple to seriously tricky
- Skill-based gameplay that mixes timing, puzzle-solving, and action
- Hero upgrades: unlock new feline champions and grow stronger as you progress
- Satisfying animations and smooth physics that make every throw feel great
- Enemies and traps: it's not just puzzles‚Äîyou‚Äôll have to outsmart swarm enemies too

Become a Cup Champion
Explore a magical world where every level brings new challenges. Battle your way through enemy swarms, master the art of the perfect shot, and rise as the legendary hero of the cup realm.

Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey isn‚Äôt just a puzzle game‚Äîit‚Äôs a heartwarming, skill-testing adventure that‚Äôll keep you coming back for more. Grab your paws, line up your shot, and get ready to become a legend.

games.title: Emoji Sort
games.description: Emoji Sort is a pattern recognition puzzle game where players must fill in empty cells with the correct emojis. Each puzzle presents a grid with missing emojis that follow specific patterns - such as categories, sequences, or associations. Players analyze the existing emojis to identify the pattern (animals, food chains, transportation types, etc.) and select the appropriate emojis to complete the grid. The game features 30 increasingly challenging levels with various pattern types, and includes a hint system to help when players get stuck. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts who enjoy discovering logical connections between visual elements!
games.howToPlayText:
Select the appropriate emoji by clicking or touching it.
Each puzzle may seem nonsensical, but there is only one correct answer!

games.title: The Depth of the Limbo
games.description:
The game is about a girl in limbo who has to complete all the levels to wake up. Top view: The character must overcome 13 levels. Each level is a one‚Äîminute test cycle, but the camera rotates around the hero, changing the orientation of the space. Due to the moving camera, you can get confused about right, left, up and down, which turns simple routes into a puzzle.

The lines of the path seem familiar until they turn around your head, forcing you to rethink each goal. The goal is simple and touching: to complete the route from beginning to end, overcome the inner noise of fear, and wake up refreshed and free.
games.howToPlayText:
On the computer:
To make the character move to the right, left, up or down, press the D, A, W, S keys or the arrows to the right, left, up or down, respectively.

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character move to the right, left, up or down, press the arrow buttons to the right, left, up or down, respectively.

games.title: Connect Line
games.description:
Connect Lines is a puzzle game in which the goal is to rotate line-segments so that together they form a continuous connected path or network i.e. all the lines must join up into one single connected structure.
It is simple in appearance but grows challenging, because you must figure out the correct orientation of each piece so that the network is complete without any breaks.
As the puzzle advances, the arrangement / layout becomes more complex. The number of line-pieces increases, the shapes become more varied, and finding the correct connection scheme becomes harder. You may need to think ahead about how rotating one piece will affect connections with several adjacent pieces. (This is standard for these kinds of puzzles.)
games.howToPlayText:
Connect all lines into one unified path (or network). Every piece must be connected properly so there are no loose ends.
The board has many small line segments. These might be straight lines, curves, etc. Each segment is oriented in some way.
You can click on a line piece to rotate it. Each click usually rotates the piece by 90¬∞ (or possibly another fixed amount) to change its orientation.

games.description:

games.title: Rotate Cups
games.description:
This is a rotation physics puzzle game where you control the angle of cups to try to get the balls to roll into specific cups.
Rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise as needed to turn the clear cups into ramps guiding the ball down the level.
Place at least one ball in each of the blue cups.
In this game you have to get all the balls into the blue cups lower down the screen.
Larger blue cups can hold more than one ball in them.
If there are multiple smaller blue cups you must get a ball into each of them.
Levels are not timed & you can both rotate as many times as you like & pause as many times as you like.

You can skip intermediary cups. On most levels you typically want to use all the cups on the way down, but if you are struggling to do so you can bump a ball off the outside of a cup or skip a cup entirely & it won‚Äôt harm you in the least provided your balls eventually get into the blue cups.
Some levels have a long reach you have to make the ball roll. On those levels sometimes a somewhat rapid cup spin toward the destination is enough, but in some cases you have to do that rapid spin as the starting point & then slightly spin back quickly right as the ball is leaving to give the ball a bit more lift.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Use your mouse left click button to select on the screen & drag your mouse to rotate the cups.
Drag left or down to spin clockwise.
Drag right or up to spin counterclockwise.

Touchscreen devices:
Tap the screen with a finger & drag your finger across the screen to rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise.

Embark on a captivating journey into the world of Wood Screw Puzzle, the ultimate wood nuts and bolts puzzle game that will challenge your mind and delight your senses. This isn't just another screw sort game; it's an immersive experience where you'll unravel intricate arrangements of wood screws, nuts and bolts, and other fascinating fasteners, proving your screw master skills along the way.

Unscrew, Unwind, and Unleash Your Inner Puzzle Master:

Each level of Wood Screw Puzzle presents a unique challenge, a mesmerizing tapestry of wood screws and nuts and bolts intertwined in a complex dance. Your task is to carefully analyze the arrangement, strategize your moves, and skillfully manipulate the screw pins and fasteners to screw out each piece and free them from their wooden embrace. It's a test of your logic, spatial reasoning, and dexterity, all wrapped up in a visually stunning and tactilely satisfying wood nuts and bolts puzzle game.
games.howToPlayText:
Solve the Wooden Puzzle: Conquer the challenge of the wooden stack, untangle bolts and nuts, and unlock the secrets hidden deep within the wood.
Master the Mechanic Puzzle: Arm yourself with a screwdriver and outsmart wood wasps, overcome the plumer crack obstacles, and avoid the whimsical squirrel nuts.
Explore the Woods: Venture into the heart of the woods game, where each level brings a new conundrum. Are you ready to delve into the mind-blowing world of Screws & Fasteners?

games.title: Laser Survivor
games.description:
Laser Survivor, a cyberpunk roguelike action-adventure set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse, the last hope for humanity rests in the hands of five heroes fighting hordes of demons pouring through a dimensional rift. Featuring pixel art visuals, randomized weapons, chiptune soundtracks, and relentless survival gameplay, every run is a test of adaptation and skill.

Story
The world has fallen. A dimensional rift has unleashed an unstoppable flood of demons, tearing through what remains of civilization. But from the chaos, five warriors rise. Each wielding unique powers forged for survival in this cyberpunk hellscape. Dropped at random into corrupted maps, they must adapt with whatever weapons and passive abilities they find, carving their path through waves of enemies, unlocking upgrades, and uncovering the truth behind the rift. The fate of Earth depends on them.

Heroes
Blaze: Fires homing bullets that lock onto the nearest enemy, ensuring no demon can escape.
Neon: Projects a protective energy shield that damages anything foolish enough to get close.
Hunter: Drops explosives that create deadly zones, controlling the battlefield with traps.
Slash: Slices enemies apart with razor-sharp horizontal cuts that pierce entire hordes.
Jaxx: A cyber-brute with massive, scaling area damage, crushing everything in his path.


Features
Cyberpunk Roguelike Gameplay: Every run is unique, with randomized spawn points, weapons, and abilities.
5 Maps to Conquer: Battle through the Lab, Forest, Crypt, Factory, and Dungeon, each swarming with demon hordes.
10 Active Weapons & 10 Passive Abilities: Build your arsenal on the fly as you adapt to randomized loadouts.
8 Missions & 11 Upgrades: Progress through challenging missions, earn permanent upgrades, and unlock new survival tactics.
Collectibles & Lore: Discover secrets that reveal the origins of the rift and the story behind the invasion.
Retro Pixel Art: Neon-infused visuals with hand-crafted pixel art and gameplay by the Felicity team.
80s Chiptune Soundtrack: Pulsating tracker music by Drozerix, driving the action with nostalgic energy.

Why Play Laser Survivor?
Fast-paced roguelike survival set in a sci-fi cyberpunk apocalypse.
Play as five unique heroes, each with distinct base abilities and upgrade paths.
Endless replayability with randomized runs and evolving builds.
Perfect for fans of pixel art shooters, bullet-hell roguelikes, and retro-inspired chiptune soundtracks.

Laser Survivor is more than survival. It‚Äôs humanity‚Äôs last stand in a cyberpunk post-apocalypse. Will you master the chaos, close the rift, and save the world... or be consumed by the demons?
games.howToPlayText: Arrow keys, or WASD for movement of the characters with keyboard, or Mouse. Touch controls on Mobile for movement of the characters.

games.title: Color Roll 3D
games.description:
Experience one of the most addictive, color-filled puzzle game ‚Äî Color Roll 3D! Think you've got a keen eye for details? Ready to challenge your brain? Then this color game is just for you! It's all about color, creativity, and some serious agility!

In Color Roll 3D, you'll need to copy the exact image you're shown, down to the last detail! How? Just by unrolling and arranging the vibrantly colored rolls the puzzle game give you for each level. Sounds easy, right? But wait, there's a catch! You've got to ensure the colors overlap in just the right way to perfectly match the image.

Got the image in your head? Great! Now get to work and let those colorful rolls fly! Just tap each roll and watch as it smoothly moves across your screen, bringing the image to life. But remember, it's all about getting those colors to line up just right!
games.howToPlayText:
You are given several colored rolls. Each roll is like a ribbon or band that you can tap to start unrolling.
When you tap, the roll moves/unrolls and overlays onto the puzzle area. The goal is that the overlapping colours and their positions match the sample image you‚Äôre trying to replicate.
The challenge comes from getting the direction and position of each roll correct. If you unroll a roll the wrong way, or overlay in the wrong spot, the final image will look different from the target.

games.title: Okay
games.description:
Okay? is a minimalist puzzle game that turns simple shapes into clever challenges. Every level is made of blocks, lines, and objects placed on a clean, abstract screen. Your goal is simple: clear all the objects with just one perfect move.

Draw a line with your finger, release it, and watch it bounce around the screen. If your move is right, the line will hit and remove every object until the screen is empty. Sounds easy? As levels go up, the puzzles get smarter, requiring perfect angles, timing, and logic.
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to clear all the elements (lines, blocks, etc.) from the board.
You draw a line (with your finger / touch) starting from somewhere, and that line interacts with the elements on screen.
The drawn line will ‚Äúpop‚Äù or hit the elements, making them disappear (‚Äúclear all the elements‚Äù) if done correctly.
There are many levels, increasingly challenging.
Some puzzles are simple; others require more precise dragging, angles, and timing.

games.title: Unravel Eggs Puzzle
games.description: Celebrate Easter weekend in style this year with the sweet new puzzle game, Unravel Eggs Puzzle! Complete each level by untangling eggs such that each line connecting eggs is not intersected by any other line connecting eggs. Warm up with some light puzzles and work your way up to an egg-tangling like you've never seen! Happy Easter!
games.howToPlayText:
Grab an egg:
Touch and drag an egg to move it around the screen.

Reposition to avoid intersections:
Adjust positions so that none of the connecting lines between eggs cross each other. All lines must be ‚Äúuntangled.‚Äù

Change color to green:
When the arrangement has no intersecting lines, the eggs and the lines turn green, meaning the level is solved.

games.title: TENKYU BALL
games.description: TENKYU BALL is a 3D casual ball-rolling puzzle game where you must guide a ball through tilting stages to reach the goal. The environment is minimalistic, and the challenge comes from balancing control vs risk. As you tilt the stage more, the ball moves faster, but there‚Äôs danger: if you tilt too much, the ball may fall off and you'll fail the level.
games.howToPlayText:
Tilt the stage / swipe finger:
You swipe (or drag) on your screen to tilt the surface on which the ball rests.
The tilt direction determines where the ball rolls.
Control carefully:
If you tilt too much, the ball gains speed and can fall off the edge.
Tilt only as much as needed to navigate turns, avoid gaps, and make tricky maneuvers.
Reach the goal:
Each stage has a goal point or exit you must reach. Successfully get the ball there without falling off.
Failure and retry:
If the ball falls, the level ends (you lose) and you‚Äôll need to restart that stage.

games.title: Telekinetic Pumpkin
games.description:
Telekinetic Pumpkin is an arcade game where an experiment aimed at creating a magnificent, oversized pumpkin for Halloween takes an unexpected turn, resulting in the creation of a telekinetic pumpkin.


You‚Äôre a Pumpkin that teleports and moves objects with its mind! Destroy drones by smashing them, and collect power-ups to stay alive. Select your upgrades and try to survive as long as possible.
games.howToPlayText: Double-click on a location to teleport. Click and drag anything to move it with your mind (boxes, enemies, or power-ups). Every 35 seconds, you can select a random upgrade or ability to help you survive longer.
